plot: A shipbuilding plant in China overcomes difficulties in buying a foreign engine for a 10,000 ton ship by designing their own engine within a month.
title: Shi hang
plot_es: A shipbuilding plant in China overcomes difficulties in buying a foreign engine for a 10,000 ton ship by designing their own engine within a month.
plot_en: A shipbuilding plant in China overcomes difficulties in buying a foreign engine for a 10,000 ton ship by designing their own engine within a month.
